Windlord::

Windlord was furios now!!!! He looked to Nighlight's body and when he 
was sure that she was ok, he moved quikcly to other place and shot 25 
of his feather-missiles against Clash



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Clash (on the ground now) was hit in the back multiple times. Clash 
gasped
> loudly. He wasn't expecting there to be so many fighters here, but 
he wasn't
> about to give up. Clahs struggled up to his feet and stumbled 
around before
> regaining his composure...
>
